entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
